  • Field Details

    • _writer

      protected Writer _writer

    • _doc

      protected Document _doc

    • _bOutline

      protected boolean _bOutline

    • _nAttributeThreshold

      protected int _nAttributeThreshold
      Number of attributes above which attributes will be printed on separate lines. If a node has more than this number of attributes, then each attribute will be printed on a separate line. Only applicable in "outline" mode. To disable this, use UNLIMITED_ATTRIBUTE_THRESHOLD.

    • DEFAULT_ATTRIBUTE_THRESHOLD

      public static final int DEFAULT_ATTRIBUTE_THRESHOLD
      The default attribute threshold.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • UNLIMITED_ATTRIBUTE_THRESHOLD

      public static final int UNLIMITED_ATTRIBUTE_THRESHOLD
      Indicates an unlimited attribute threshold, meaning that attributes will never be printed on separate lines.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values
